content.html: Guardian headline says: “UK households warned of ‘year of the squeeze’ as cost of living soars” whereas FT headline notes: “Corporate cash haul hits $12 trillion in ‘blockbuster year’ for markets”
content.value:
Guardian headline says:
“UK households warned of ‘year of the squeeze’ as cost of living soars”

whereas FT headline notes: 
“Corporate cash haul hits $12 trillion in ‘blockbuster year’ for markets”
